com.mycompany.pewpewgame.controllers

Class EnemyAI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mycompany.pewpewgame.controllers.EnemyAI

  • public class EnemyAI
extends Object
    The AI class updates the orientation of every enemy to face the player and selects the direction based on the greater X or Y distance. The enemy speed is a constant, and therefore not handled by AI.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EnemyAI(EnemyController ec, Player player)
      The constructor also initializes the ThreadPoolExecutor and starts the AI decision timer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void updateDirections(ArrayList<GameObject> enemies)
      Update the direction of every Enemy by calculating and choosing firstly the greater of the X or Y values and then choosing the direction accordingly.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • EnemyAI

        public EnemyAI(EnemyController ec,
               Player player)
        The constructor also initializes the ThreadPoolExecutor and starts the AI decision timer.
        Parameters:
        ec - the EnemyController.
        player - the Player.

    • Method Detail

      • updateDirections

        public void updateDirections(ArrayList<GameObject> enemies)
        Update the direction of every Enemy by calculating and choosing firstly the greater of the X or Y values and then choosing the direction accordingly.
        Parameters:
        enemies - all the Enemies active.
